name: Touhou Jaseishou: The Last Comer
storyline:
Written by Milka Oyasu, the religion of Christianity features as its main theme.
A star has fallen into Gensokyo, setting aflame the forest and the cherry trees, and simultaneously, a mysterious light has appeared in the sky. Reimu Hakurei, Marisa Kirisame, and Sakuya Izayoi go out to investigate the cause of these strange occurrences.
summary: Touhou fangame developed by Ido, Yuuyu and Hatsuke. The main gimmick of The Last Comer is based around collecting stars to fill a gauge, which is similar to Ten Desires' Trance gauge.
